original: HANNGREN, Harald Vilhelm, Disponent, Konsul, Gävle, f Dala-Husby, Kopparb l, 22/4 82 av överste G H o Olga Lagergren, gm Svea Lundquist. Studex, språk- o aff.stud Frankr, Dn&l p Tyskl, prakt sågv, b rö dg o cellul.fabr. Korresp Sv gen.kons i Paris 01— 02, förs.ch Kopparb o Hofors sågv.AB 03—07, sekr Sv Träv.exp.frn 07—09, förs.ch Korsnäs sågv.AB sed. 09, disp sed. 43. Flm hdlskamm, Styr.led Gävle borgarsk o h hdlsinst, fd led hamnstyr, fransk kons i Gävle sed. 19, huv.m sparbkn, styr.led Grycksbo papp.br AB, AB Sv sprit, v. ordf Gävle, Sohn o Hud träv.-expfrns arb.utsk, styr.suppl Sv träv.exp.frn, fd Styr.led Sv cellul.frn. Resor: USA, Egypt, Tunisien, Alg, Marocko, uppr ggr i Engl, Frank, Tyskl, Holl, Belg, Span, Ital. Av trycket: Jämf tab v träm.förs, 2 uppl. RVO, Off de TIp, BV i London, Sällsk NT i Gävle, Rotary, KAK. Hobbies: Resor, böcker, släkt-forskn, bridge.
translated: HANNGREN, Harald Vilhelm, Manager, Consul, Gävle, born in Dala-Husby, Kopparberg county, on 22/4 1882, son of Colonel G H and Olga Lagergren, married to Svea Lundquist. High school graduate, language and business studies in France, Denmark, and Germany, practical training in sawmills, board of directors and cellulose factory. Correspondent, Swedish Consulate General in Paris from 1901 to 1902, sales manager at Kopparberg and Hofors sawmill company from 1903 to 1907, secretary at Swedish Timber Export Company from 1907 to 1909, sales manager at Korsnäs sawmill company since 1909, appointed as manager since 1943. Member of the Trade Chamber, Board of Directors for Gävle bourgeois and trade institutions, former member of the Port Authority Board, French Consul in Gävle since 1919, main commissioner at the savings bank, board member of Grycksbo paper mill company, Swedish spirits company, vice chairman of Gävle, Sohn and Hud timber export company's work committee, board substitute at Swedish timber export company, former board member of Swedish cellulose company. Travels: USA, Egypt, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, extensive travels in England, France, Germany, Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Italy. Published: Comparative table of timber sales, 2 editions. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa, Officer of the Order de TIp, Member of the London Timber Trade Association, member of the Swedish National Theater Society in Gävle, Rotary International, and the Royal Automobile Club. Hobbies: Traveling, books, genealogy research, bridge.

memberOf.name: Swedish National Theater Society in Gävle

accomplishments.name: Officer of the Order de TIp
